list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (with reference to a liquid) reach or cause to reach the temperature at which it bubbles and turns to vapor.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we tried to get people to boil their drinking water
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã cố gắng để có được mọi người đun sôi nước uống của họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (with reference to food) cook or be cooked by immersing in boiling water or stock.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: boil the potatoes until well done
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đun sôi khoai tây cho đến khi làm tốt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of the sea or clouds) be turbulent and stormy.
the temperature at which a liquid bubbles and turns to vapor.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: stir in cream and bring to a boil

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an inflamed pus-filled swelling on the skin, caused typically by the infection of a hair follicle.
